resources.string: Are you sure you want to do this?
The number of remaining cheat tokens is %d!
Learn the most common phrasal verbs

This app is dedicated to one of the most difficult topic in the English language - phrasal verbs. 
We have included 100 common phrasal verbs. You can read and learn them.
After you have studied the verbs you are able to check your knowledge. The app has True/False questions. You can answer questions and get feedback if you answered correctly or not. You also have an interesting option to cheat to find the answer.
Enjoy :)
